title: Gmail app on Pixel 3a not displaying 'from' name when I send emails
content:
I have set up several email addresses using IMAP on the Gmail app.

The emails are set up correctly but the 'from' name is not being displayed when I send an email. The recipient just sees the first part of the email before the @ displayed the sender (eg. dominic)

I have set up my full name to display in the settings but its not showing

Can anyone help please?
